data.text: Ao Onyankopɔn, gye me nkwa
Meremem wɔ atɛkyɛ a emu dɔ mu,
Mafrɛ mabrɛ sɛ mepɛ mmoa.
Wɔn a wɔtane me kwa no dɔɔso
Ao Onyankopɔn, wonim me kwasea a mayɛ;
Mma wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to wo so no
Wo enti wobu me animtiaa,
Mete sɛ ɔhɔhoɔ wɔ me nuanom mu,
na wo fie ho mmɔdemmɔ hyɛ me so,
Sɛ metwa adwo na medi mmuada a
sɛ mefira ayitoma a
Wɔn a wɔtete ɛpono no ano no sere me,
Nanso mɛbɔ wo mpaeɛ, Ao Awurade,
Yi me firi atɛkyɛ no mu,
Mma nsuo nnyiri mfa me
Ao Awurade, gye me so firi wʼadɔeɛ a ɛyɛ no mu;
Mfa wʼanim nhinta wo ɔsomfoɔ;
Twi bɛn me na gye me;
Wonim sɛdeɛ wɔkasa tia me, gu mʼanim ase na wɔtiatia mʼanim;
Kasatia ahyɛ mʼakoma so
Wɔde bɔnwoma guu mʼaduane mu,
Ma wɔn didipono a ɛsi wɔn anim nyi wɔn sɛ afidie;
Ma wɔn ani so nyɛ wɔn kusuu na wɔanhunu adeɛ,
Hwie wʼabufuhyeɛ gu wɔn so;
Ma wɔn atenaeɛ nyɛ amamfo;
Wɔtaa wɔn a wopira wɔn no,
Fa amumuyɛ mu amumuyɛ ho soboɔ bɔ wɔn;
Pepa wɔn din firi nkwa nwoma no mu,
Mewɔ ɔyea ne ahohiahia mu;
Mede dwomtoɔ bɛyi Onyankopɔn din ayɛ
Yei bɛsɔ Awurade ani yie asene nantwie,
Mmɔborɔni bɛhunu na nʼani agye,
Awurade tie wɔn a adeɛ ahia wɔn,
Ma ɔsoro ne asase nkamfo no,
ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛgye Sion nkwa
Nʼasomfoɔ asefoɔ na wɔbɛfa hɔ,
